# calendar

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->


## Installation

You can install from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("rpruim/calendar")
```

## Example

```{r example}
library(calendar)
library(dplyr)
cal <-
  daily2cal(
    path  = system.file("daily.txt", package = "calendar"),
    start = lubridate::mdy("1/28/2019"),
    mask  = c(2, 4, 6)
  ) 
```

```{r html, results = "asis"}
calendar_css() %>% cat()
cal %>% html_calendar(show = 2:6) %>% cat()
```

```{r gg, fig.width = 9, fig.height = 3, warning = FALSE}
cal %>% gg_calendar(show = 2:6, size = 4)
```
